title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. A view that is maximized should stay maximized.
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the CVS repository view. 
2. Maximize the view. 
3. Switch to a different perspective. 
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
